00016 /* Maximum number of channels supported  */
00017 #define CIMAXIPCCHAN       14
00018 #define CIINVIPCCHAN       CIMAXIPCCHAN /* used for error checking
00019                                          * This value cannot be used
00020                                          * for indexing our channel
00021                                          * array as it is out
00022                                          * of bounds.
00023                                          */
00024 
00025 /* Maximum number of RR & Notification channel-pairs supported  */
00026 #define CIMAXRRPAIR      5
00027 
00028 /* Maximum number of DR services supported  */
00029 #define CIMAXDRSVC         3
00030 
00031 /* IPC channels names */

00033 #define CIIPCDIAG       "DIAG"
00034 #define CIIPCUDIAG      "UDIAG"
00035 #define CIIPCNMEA       "NMEA"
00036 #define CIIPCUNMEA      "UNMEA"
00037 #define CIIPCAT         "AT"
00038 #define CIIPCUAT        "UAT"

00040 #define CIIPCQMRR1      "QMRR1"

00042 #define CIIPCUQMRR1     "QMURR1"

00045 #endif /* SLQS */
00046 /*
00047  * Name:    ciipcifusetyp
00048  *
00049  * Purpose: High-level usage indicator
00050  *
00051  * Members: CIRR       - Request/Response channel
00052  *          CINOTIF    - Notification channel
00053  *          CIDRSVC    - Data Relay service channel
00054  *          CIUI       - User Interface channel
00055  *
00056  * Note:
00057  */
00058 enum ciipcifusetyp
00059 {
00060     CIRR,
00061     CINOTIF,
00062     CIDRSVC,
00063     CIUI,
00064     CIUSETYPEMAX
00065 };
00066 
00078 enum ciifacetype
00079 {
00080     CIIPC,
00081     CIUIF,
00082     CIIFINVALID
00083 };
00084 
00085 /*************
00086  *
00087  * Name:    ciipcchanfixed
00088  *
00089  * Purpose: Structure that implements a table of fixed channel information.
00090  *
00091  * Members: cichannamep     - Pointer to name of channel
00092  *          cipeerchannamep - Pointer to name of peer channel, eg, notification
00093  *          ciiftype        - Interface type - IPC or USB (currently)
00094  *          ciipcifuse      - Usage of IPC channel, ie, type of service
00095  *          ciuifuse        - Usage of USB channel, ie, type of service
00096  *
00097  * Notes:
00098  *
00099  **************/
00100 struct ciipcchanfixed
00101 {
00102     char           *cichannamep;
00103     char           *cipeerchannamep;
00104     enum ciifacetype    ciiftype;
00105     enum ciipcifusetyp  ciipcifuse;
00106     enum useptype       ciuifuse;
00107 };
00108 
00109 /*************
00110  *
00111  * Name:    ciipcchan
00112  *
00113  * Purpose: Structure that implements a table of all channel information.
00114  *
00115  * Members: cichanfixedinfop  - Pointer to fixed info portion
00116  *          cichannel         - Channel number
00117  *          ciipccb           - Storage for IPC control block
00118  *
00119  * Notes:
00120  *
00121  **************/
00122 struct ciipcchan
00123 {
00124     struct ciipcchanfixed *cichanfixedinfop;
00125     swi_uint16 cichannel;
00126     struct icipccb ciipccb;
00127 };
